Deprecated API

Contents

  • Methods
  • Methods 
    Method Description
    com.privalia.qa.aspects.ReplacementAspect.replaceCodePlaceholders​(String, JoinPoint)
    Deprecated. @{} functions can now be performed using StringSubstitutor with the ${} variable placeholder
    com.privalia.qa.aspects.ReplacementAspect.replacePropertyPlaceholders​(String, JoinPoint)
    Deprecated. This same function can now be perform via StringSubstitutor with the EnvPropertyLookup (i.e. #{my.key} can be represented as ${envProperties:my.key})
    com.privalia.qa.aspects.ReplacementAspect.replaceReflectionPlaceholders​(String, JoinPoint)
    Deprecated. ${} placeholder can also be used as placeholder for Thread variables
    com.privalia.qa.specs.CommonG.generateRequest​(String, boolean, String, String, String, String, String, String)
    com.privalia.qa.specs.RestSpec.assertResponseStatusLength​(Integer, String)
    com.privalia.qa.specs.RestSpec.sendRequestTimeout​(Integer, Integer, String, String, String, String)
    com.privalia.qa.specs.SeleniumGSpec.assertSeleniumNElementExistsOnTimeOut​(Integer, Integer, Integer, String, String)
    use SeleniumGSpec.waitWebElementWithPooling(int, int, int, String, String, String) instead.
    com.privalia.qa.specs.SeleniumGSpec.seleniumBrowse​(String, String)
    This method is deprecated, use SeleniumGSpec.iGoToUrl(String) instead
    com.privalia.qa.specs.SeleniumGSpec.seleniumClick​(Integer)
    This method is deprecated, use SeleniumGSpec.seleniumClickByLocator(String, String, Integer) instead
    com.privalia.qa.specs.SeleniumGSpec.seleniumDoubleClick​(Integer)
    This method is deprecated, use SeleniumGSpec.seleniumDoubleClickByLocator(String, String, Integer) instead
    com.privalia.qa.specs.SeleniumGSpec.seleniumRightClick​(Integer)
    This method is deprecated, use SeleniumGSpec.seleniumRightClickByLocator(String, String, Integer) instead
    com.privalia.qa.specs.SeleniumGSpec.seleniumType​(String, Integer)
    This method is deprecated, use SeleniumGSpec.seleniumTypeByLocator(String, String, String, Integer) instead
    com.privalia.qa.specs.SeleniumGSpec.setupApp​(String)
    This method is deprecated, use SeleniumGSpec.iGoToUrl(String) instead
    com.privalia.qa.specs.SshGSpec.checkShellExitStatus​(int)
    Success exit status is directly checked in the "execute remote command" method, so this is not needed anymore.
    com.privalia.qa.utils.KafkaUtils.sendMessage​(String, String)
